channel.title: GLoc
channel.description: GLoc is an adaptation of NonLinLoc.

item.title: GLoc
item.description:
GLoc in an adaptation of NonLinLoc.

NonLinLoc is a set of programs for locating earthquakes in 3D structures and for visualizing location results. You can find everything about this original program at A. Lomax website.

These github pages are part of the gloc repository.
Here you will find notes on working with this program. Mostly in Czech.
